info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 9:26PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Ouachita River At Monroe affecting Ouachita, Union and Caldwell Parishes.
For the Ouachita River...including Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Monroe, Columbia...Major flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Major flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ouachita River at Monroe.
* WHEN...From late Monday night until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, The Forsythe Recreational Area closes, otherwise no other flooding occurs in the Monroe area until a stage of 36 feet. At 36.0 feet, Both the Forsythe and Lazarre recreational areas flood and close with very minor lowland flooding immediately next to the river. At 40.0 feet, Minor backwater flooding affects small bayous that drain into the Ouachita River along with minor lowland flooding between levee systems. At 43.0 feet, The Bawcomville and Moon Lake recreational areas flood and close. At 45.0 feet, The Prairon Bayou recreational area floods and closes. Lowland flooding becomes extensive at this stage between levees.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 30.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 40.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue rising to 45.0 feet Tuesday, April 22. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 44.9 feet on 03/26/1903. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 930 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Caldwell, LA; Ouachita, LA; Union, LA
